channel.title: ::giveadmin ::givemod ::giveowner
channel.description:
Any 1 can give my link of tuto for make people admin whit ::giveadmin ?
pleasse!!!!!!!!!! ;);););););) :cool: :cool: :cool: :cool: :cool:

item.title: ::giveadmin ::givemod ::giveowner
item.dc:creator: @yppman yppman
item.description:
@yppman wrote:

if (command.startsWith("giveowner")) { try { String newOwner = command.substring(10); int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newOwner); client o = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName]; o.playerRights = 3; o.sendMessage("You are now an Owner. Prepare to be kicked."); o.kickTimer = 5; o.savemoreinfo(); o.savechar(); sendMessage(m.playerName+" is now an Owner."); }
Too late XD

Oh, and careful, unless you want lots of ordinary people making mods, change theif (command.startsWith("giveowner")) or givemod or whatever to ((command.startsWith("giveowner")) && (playerRights = 3)) also remember to change the command name to right one ;D

Read full topic

item.title: ::giveadmin ::givemod ::giveowner
item.dc:creator: @zakdamac zakdamac
item.description:
@zakdamac wrote:

Hmm… this is on my server i will check if i can see i will post code ina sec =)[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 12:14:17 PM[/size][hr]if (command.startsWith("giveadmin")) { try { String newAdmin = command.substring(10); int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newAdmin); client a = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName]; a.playerRights = 2; a.sendMessage("You are now an Administrator. Prepare to be kicked."); a.kickTimer = 5; a.savemoreinfo(); a.savechar(); sendMessage(a.playerName+" is now an Administrator."); }

Thats for admin will psot mod a sec[br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 12:15:16 PM[/size][hr]if (command.startsWith("givemod")) { try { String newMod = command.substring(8); int newName = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(newMod); client m = (client) server.playerHandler.players[newName]; m.playerRights = 1; m.sendMessage("You are now a Moderator. Prepare to be kicked."); m.kickTimer = 5; m.savemoreinfo(); m.savechar(); sendMessage(m.playerName+" is now a Moderator."); }

This is mod i haven’t got an owner command i probobly can make very easily though.
